subject: Design
title: Trust Signals: Why Design Builds Confidence
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Trust Signals: Why Design Builds Confidence.

hook.text: Users decide within 50 milliseconds whether they trust a website. Design makes or breaks that judgment.

buildup.text: Clean layout, professional typography, and consistent spacing signal competence and credibility.

discovery.text: Trust signals include padlock icons, recognizable payment logos, and real customer photos.

twist.text: A beautiful site with one broken link loses more trust than an ugly site that works perfectly.

climax.text: Trust is the UX metric nobody measures but everyone feels. One misstep and it's gone.

punchline.text: Trust takes seconds to lose and months to rebuild.

quiz.question: How quickly do users judge website trustworthiness?
